easy_setup.title: Easy Setup
easy_setup.description:
Select your Bluetooth-enabled media player from the list. 
(Only devices that appear as Bluetooth media players are listed.)

advanced_setup.title: Advanced Setup (Step: 1/3)
advanced_setup.description: Select any media player entity from Home Assistant.

mac_address.title: Advanced Setup (Step: 2/3)
mac_address.description:
Enter the Bluetooth MAC address for the selected device.
(If found automatically, it will be pre-filled.)

settings.title: Advanced Setup (Step: 3/3)
settings.description: Configure timing and other advanced settings.
